channel.title: Vs on 程序猿的小本本
channel.description: Recent content in Vs on 程序猿的小本本

item.title: Visualstudio C语言包含C++头文件编译不通过
item.author: chennqqi@qq.com (chennqqi)
item.description: error C2054: expected '(' to follow 'using' error C2061: syntax error : identifier 'using' c:\program files\microsoft visual studio 10.0\vc\include\cstdio(38): error C2054: expected '(' to follow 'using' c:\program files\microsoft visual studio 10.0\vc\include\cstdio(40): error C2061: syntax error : identifier 'using' c:\program files\microsoft visual studio 10.0\vc\include\cstdio(40): error C2054: expected '(' to follow 'using' c:\program files\microsoft visual studio 10.0\vc\include\cstdio(40): error C2061: syntax error : identifier 'using' c:\program files\microsoft visual studio 10.0\vc\include\cstdio(41): error C2061: syntax error : identifier 'clearerr' VS 编译代码时，如果里边既包含C又包含C++，在公共头文件中有C++头文件（如stl系列）时会报这个错误
